body.name: ESWU Travel Makeup Mirror with Light, Portable Folding Make Up Tabletop Mirror with 58 LEDs 3 Colors Light Modes Rechargable Compact Vanity Mirror with Adjustable Stand (White)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 14 hrs 28 mins
features: ✔️【Portable Travel Vanity Mirror】Size: 6.1in*8.26in. ESWU travel mirror with light is compact design and foldable, and comes with a waterproof storage bag, easy to carry in your Luggage, handbag and backpack. Whether you travel, party, business trip, the unique mirror is very suitable for you, your family, and your friends

🔆【3 Light Colors and Dimmable】ESWU light up makeup mirror has 58 LED lights, it features a smart light mode and highly sensitive touch control. Just touch it lightly with your finger, the light and brightness of the mirror can be adjusted, you can freely switch between 3 modes: Soft warm light, Neutral light, and White light. No matter day, night, home or office, they meet all your needs in different circumstances, allowing you to protect your eyes while carefully applying makeup

👍【180° Adjustable Smart Makeup Mirror】The desktop makeup mirror has a bracket that can rotate and move 180° back and forth, so you can flexibly adjust the viewing angle that suits you best. The bracket of mirror is equipped with an intelligent sensing system, which turns on the light immediately when the bracket is opened, and automatically turns off the light when the mirror is closed, making it more convenient and time-saving for you to use

🔋【 Rechargeable Folding Lighted Makeup Mirror】Built-in 1500mAh lithium battery, Only 2-3 hours recharging for 3-7 hours operation, great for daily life operation, no worry about replacing batteries. Type C cable included, convenient to recharge this makeup mirror from the power bank and outlet. The indicator lights will flash red for recharging reminding, and turn green when fully charged, fitting for home, travel or working use

❤️【100% Satisfaction Guarantee】The cosmetic mirror is made of high-quality ABS and glass material,without any magnification and distortion. Customer first, we offer 90-days replacement guarantee, we can help if you have any issues after your purchase. This makeup mirror with lights will be a best gift for your mom, daughter, sister, girlfriend and wife on Christmas, Valentine's Day, Thanksgiving, birthday, Mother’s Day or another special day

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best travel mirror
reviews.reviewText: I love this travel mirror! It's not just user-friendly but also the ultimate travel companion. Right out of the box, it spoils you with a bag to cradle the mirror, a Type C charger, and the mirror itself. The rechargeable feature is a game-changer; It lasts almost a week on one charge. Recharging is a breeze – plug it in, wait for the green light, and you're good to go. The two soft-touch buttons on the left handle power, and a long press adjusts the brightness. On the right, toggle between yellow, white, and blue hues. My favorite feature is the adjustable frame, perfect for different surfaces, ensuring the mirror stays put for flawless makeup application. Highly recommend for those in need of a portable, well-lit and compact mirror.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Brighter capability than expected
reviews.reviewText: I just received this today, so I can’t speak to longevity. However, on first impression I’m really impressed with this and I wish I’d had this years ago as it would have made travel so much easier!! The lights are adjustable but generally so much brighter capability than I’d expected, so I’m really pleased with that. I mostly like the design…it’s pretty sleek and feels like a good weight (not too light or heavy). The only thing I wish is that the height was adjustable with maybe a telescoping stand or something. As it is, you have three different heights and those are the only options (one height is all three parts in a triangle shape, the second height is the second picture shown in the listing, and then the final height shown in the listing photo is achieved by flipping the mirror around to the other side of the stand). Overall, seems like a great product for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect sized mirror
reviews.reviewText: If you are looking for a lighted makeup mirror this is the perfect one to buy. The size is great and there are different lighting options with it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Love this item. Bought it for when we travel. Hotel bathroom mirrors just aren’t convenient for putting on makeup. This mirror is easy to pack and easy to use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars somewhat delicate... but comes as advertised
reviews.reviewText: Will keep this short: the first one arrived with a broken mirror. seller acted quickly to replace it and the next one was fine. The lighting aspects of this mirror are great with adjustable brightness... the compact size as well, it's rechargeable and great for travel. Recommended.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Multiple adjustable tilt
reviews.reviewText: Price is great. It’s good for home or travel. Comes with a cleaning cloth for the mirrors and a drawstring bag. Good size. I really love the magnetic 10x magnification small round mirror. It’s perfect for applying eye makeup and checking foundation, blush, lips and contouring. I bought the pink one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars On the go must
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as described. Works for days without needing to be charged and then charges quickly. Stays where you adjust it to and doesn't fall down. Compact and easy to pack.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for travel
reviews.reviewText: This is a really good size for travel and folds really flat. I also use it for everyday. The battery doesn’t last that long. 1.5-2 hours on one charge. So I have to charge it everyday. It’s a great mirror otherwise.
